title.narrative: Cen. Nac. Pobla. y Viv. y Enc. sobre Presupuesto de Hogares: Aum. Estadi. Bas.
Nat. Pop. & Housing Census & Household Budget Survey: Incre. use of Basic Stats.

description.narrative: El objetivo general del programa consiste en incrementar y facilitar eluso de la información demográfica, social, económica y cultural básica de laRepublica de Suriname. Sus objetivos específicos consisten en (i) actualizar losdatos estadísticos y hacerlos más precisos; (ii) dar acceso más expedito a los datos difundidos, y (iii) producir y difundir datos en forma oportuna mediante elfortalecimiento de la capacidad institucional de la OGE.

The general objective of the program is to increase and facilitate the use of the basic demographic, social, economic, and cultural information of the Republic of Suriname. The specific objectives of the program are: (i) to update the statistical data and improve its accuracy; (ii) to achieve greater accessibility to disseminated data; and (iii) to produce and disseminate data in a timely manner through the strengthening of the institutional capacity of the GBS.

activity-description.narrative: As part of the information campaign a slogan "Everywhere, No matter how, Census gives Development a chance" was developed to promote the Census activities
Census field workers interviewed the head of all families in the country to collect the required information
The Post-enumeration survey was conducted as a sample to validate the information provided by the census enumerators previously during the census period
Through the program a server was installed and served to upgrade the cartographic section of the Census Office
Training was provided to census enumerators from different districts
Training was provided to census enumerators selected from different districts
